statement_text: The voraciousness of the virus prompted Dr. Jeremy Farrar, chief scientist of the World Health Organization in April to call it "a global zoonotic animal pandemic."

rationale: The segment mentions the 'voraciousness' (a noun) of the virus and calls it a 'pandemic' (a scale/outcome), not intensifier + risk-adjective.
